name: Guybrush Ulysses Threepwood
title: Mighty Pirate™
occupation: Professional Swashbuckler and Insult Sword Fighter
skills: Improvising with rubber chickens with pulleys in the middle
Defeating supernatural threats with root beer
Navigating conversations with a skull named Murray

experience.title: Ghost Pirate Hunter
experience.description: Defeated the ghost pirate LeChuck multiple times using unorthodox methods

experience.title: Governor of Melee Island
experience.description: Brief stint as governor, mostly spent looking for wife Elaine

experience.title: Freelance Treasure Hunter
experience.description: Searched for Big Whoop, discovered it was just a tacky amusement park

specialAchievements: Survived being thrown into the sea with concrete shoes
Mastered the art of 'Insult Sword Fighting'
Invented 'Grog XD', an extra-corrosive version of the pirate beverage
Became proficient in Monkey Kombat, a primate-based martial art

relationships.bestFriend: A rubber chicken with a pulley in the middle

interests: Collecting seemingly useless items that always end up saving the day
Engaging in witty banter with inanimate objects
weaknesses: Tendency to be caught in elaborate traps
Easily distracted by shiny objects and treasure maps
motto: Look behind you, a three-headed monkey!
